process.subtitle: How We Work
process.title: Our
process.description: A proven methodology that ensures successful project delivery from concept to launch and beyond.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: We start by understanding your vision, goals, and requirements through in-depth discussions.

planning.title: Planning
planning.description: Our team creates a detailed roadmap, architecture design, and project timeline.

development.title: Development
development.description: We build your solution using agile methodology with regular updates and feedback loops.

launch.title: Launch & Support
launch.description: We deploy your project and provide ongoing maintenance and support.

faq.subtitle: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our services and process. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us directly.

technologies.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
technologies.answer: We specialize in modern web technologies including React, Next.js, Vue.js, Node.js, Python, and Go. For mobile development, we work with React Native and Flutter. We also have expertise in cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, and Azure.

timeline.question: How long does a typical project take?
timeline.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity. A simple website might take 2-4 weeks, while a complex web application could take 3-6 months. We provide detailed timelines during the planning phase after understanding your requirements.

support.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
support.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive post-launch support and maintenance packages. This includes bug fixes, security updates, performance monitoring, and feature enhancements. We can tailor a support plan to your specific needs.

process.question: What is your development process?
process.answer: We follow an agile methodology with iterative development cycles. This includes discovery, planning, development sprints, testing, and deployment. You'll have regular check-ins and demos throughout the project to ensure we're aligned with your vision.

team.question: Can you work with our existing team?
team.answer: Absolutely! We frequently integrate with in-house teams as an extension of their capabilities. We can adapt to your workflows, tools, and communication preferences to ensure seamless collaboration.

pricing.question: How do you handle project pricing?
pricing.answer: We offer both fixed-price and time-and-materials pricing models. Fixed-price works well for projects with clearly defined scope, while T&M offers flexibility for evolving requirements. We provide detailed estimates after the discovery phase.

aiPricing.title: AI Integration
aiPricing.description: Transparent pricing for AI solutions. Choose the package that fits your automation needs.
aiPricing.note: * Prices depend on complexity and scope. We offer custom quotes for specific requirements.

process.review: We carefully review every message and get back to you with a thoughtful response.
